类 Sudoku

  • java.lang.Object
    • Grid
      • Sudoku

  • public class Sudoku
extends Grid
    Sudoku class for solving Sudoku puzzles. Extends the Grid class to provide additional functionality specific to Sudoku.

    • 构造器概要

      构造器 
      构造器和说明
      Sudoku()
      Constructor for the Sudoku class.

    • 方法概要

      所有方法 实例方法 具体方法 
      限定符和类型 方法和说明
      java.util.Set<java.lang.Integer>[][] getInference()
      Gets the possible candidates for each cell in the Sudoku grid.
      int[][] getOneRandomAnswer()
      Gets one valid random solution for the Sudoku puzzle.
      boolean isValid(int row, int col, int num)
      Checks if placing a number in a specific cell is valid.
      void parse(java.lang.String gridStr)
      Parses the Sudoku grid from a string input.
      boolean solve()
      Solves the Sudoku puzzle using backtracking.

      • 从类继承的方法 Grid

        checkInput, getBox, getColumn, getGrid, getGridIterator, getRow, init, parseInput

      • 从类继承的方法 java.lang.Object

        clone, equals, finalize, getClass, hashCode, notify, notifyAll, toString, wait, wait, wait

    • 构造器详细资料

      • Sudoku

        public Sudoku()
        Constructor for the Sudoku class. Initializes the Sudoku grid.

    • 方法详细资料

      • parse

        public void parse(java.lang.String gridStr)
        Parses the Sudoku grid from a string input.
        参数:
        gridStr - the string representation of the Sudoku grid
        抛出:
        java.lang.IllegalArgumentException - if the input string is invalid

      • getInference

        public java.util.Set<java.lang.Integer>[][] getInference()
        Gets the possible candidates for each cell in the Sudoku grid.
        返回:
        a 2D array of sets, where each set contains the possible candidates for a cell
        抛出:
        java.lang.IllegalStateException - if the grid is not initialized

      • isValid

        public boolean isValid(int row,
                       int col,
                       int num)
        Checks if placing a number in a specific cell is valid.
        参数:
        row - the row index of the cell
        col - the column index of the cell
        num - the number to place in the cell
        返回:
        true if the placement is valid, false otherwise

      • solve

        public boolean solve()
        Solves the Sudoku puzzle using backtracking.
        返回:
        true if the puzzle is solved, false otherwise

      • getOneRandomAnswer

        public int[][] getOneRandomAnswer()
        Gets one valid random solution for the Sudoku puzzle.
        返回:
        a 2D array representing the solved Sudoku grid
        抛出:
        java.lang.IllegalArgumentException - if no solution exists for the given puzzle
